item.title: Introduction to Git and GitHub
item.description: Event Link Join me in this workshop where you can let about Git and GitHub from the very basics. Agenda: What is git? Some basic terminal commands Create a repository with a website What is GitHub? Upload your repository to github Publish website using github pages Missed some part of the event or want to get a head start? Head over to the documentation and find all the resources for this event.

item.title: Getting Started With Electron
item.description: Electron is a framework for building cross-platform desktop applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. With electron you can use existing web development skills to create desktop applications. Some of the most famous apps that have been made using electron are: Visual Studio Code Twitch Microsoft Teams Whatsapp Desktop Since electron apps use HTML, CSS and JavaScript, you can also use various libraries such as React, Bootstrap, etc.
